title: Software Engineer, Freeform Collaboration — Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. The Vision Pro Freeform Team is looking for an experienced software engineer to lead our efforts in collaboration and sync.
description: Collaboration is at the core of using the Freeform experience on Apple Vision Pro. The ideal candidate should have deep expertise in shipping software of substantial complexity and building networked collaboration experiences at Apple-scale.
preferred_qualifications: 3+ years experience in shipping code on Apple’s platforms. Deep experience with Apple’s core programming languages (Objective-C, Swift). Experience with building UI for networked systems, real-time systems, or collaborative applications. An interest in spatial computing or AR/VR technologies. Optional: Experience with Convergent Replicated Data Types (CRDTs). Optional: Experience with networking and collaboration frameworks for Apple platforms. Optional: Affinity towards modern software development methodologies and practices.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $143,100 and $264,200. Additionally, Apple employees have the opportunity to become shareholders, receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, reimbursement for certain educational expenses, as well as discretionary bonuses or commission payments, and relocation benefits.
